meanings.sent1: One of the students in our class is named Reginas.
meanings.sent2: The Reginas in the office were all talented professionals.
meanings.sent3: At the party, three Reginas showed up, causing some confusion.
meanings.sent4: The group of Reginas shone brightly in the talent show.
meanings.sent5: The name Regina is like a crown, and the Reginas wore it proudly.

meanings.definition: Reginas - the plural form of Regina, referring to multiple individuals named Regina
meanings.sent1: In the park, we saw a group of Reginas having a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The Reginas at the event all wore matching outfits.
meanings.sent3: The Reginas decided to start a band called 'The Crowned Ones'.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with flowers, each one a Regina in its own right.
meanings.sent5: The Reginas stood out in the crowd, each one unique and special.
